name: Olive
summary: Dark olive background and green-orange colors colorscheme
description:
Changed name from greenorange to olive ^_%

This colorscheme has dark olive green background, and some bright green-yellow color.
Only tested on java, c, vim, and LaTeX files. Not tested for long coding session :P

GUI only. Some screenshots at http://cherry.f2g.net/olive.html

Thanks.

versions.release_notes: Changed background color to dark olive (and changed the colorscheme name too :-), added fold and statusline color.
